document_data.title: Quests from the Infinite Staircase
document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.mainbody:
Quests from the Infinite Staircase'' updates and adapts six well-known adventurers from earlier editions of {{dnd}}: ''The Lost City'', ''When a Star Falls'', ''Beyond the Crystal Cave'', ''Pharaoh'', ''The Lost Caverns of Tsojcanth'', and ''Expedition to the Barrier Peaks'', suiting player-characters of levels 1 to 13. These use the [[Infinite Staircase]] as a linking story.

As adaptations, these adventurers are not considered canon for this wiki, though ''Pharaoh'' was previously adapted to the ''Forgotten Realms'' in ''[[Desert of Desolation]]'', which is considered to be canon.
document_data.Description:
''Quests from the Infinite Staircase'' updates and adapts six well-known adventurers from earlier editions of {{dnd}}: ''The Lost City'', ''When a Star Falls'', ''Beyond the Crystal Cave'', ''Pharaoh'', ''The Lost Caverns of Tsojcanth'', and ''Expedition to the Barrier Peaks'', suiting player-characters of levels 1 to 13. These use the [[Infinite Staircase]] as a linking story.

As adaptations, these adventurers are not considered canon for this wiki, though ''Pharaoh'' was previously adapted to the ''Forgotten Realms'' in ''[[Desert of Desolation]]'', which is considered to be canon.
